component.name: filter_sam_reads
component.doc: removes multi-genome mappers from mapped and sorted transcript file

input.name: duplicates
input.doc: file with reads to be removed, output from previous component: remove_multi_mappers

input.name: infolder
input.doc: sorted sam file in folder, output from previous component: sort_sam

output.name: outfolder
output.doc: sorted sam file with reads that map only to one gene (but can be different transcripts)

parameter.name: filter
parameter.doc: desired filtering, default excludeReadList, here list with duplicates has to be provided in inputs
